title: Chasm Runner's Price
description: A shadow in the Undercity, Kael thought he could steal anything. But the Phoenix Ember wasn't just treasure—it was a beacon. Now he's being hunted by the Steel-Souled, whose null-magic fields are death to all sorcery. Trapped between two implacable hunters and a thousand-foot drop, Kael must pay the price for his prize, turning the Ember's fire against those who would "cleanse" it in a desperate, explosive gamble
author: odiase
